text: وَذَا ٱلنُّونِ إِذ ذَّهَبَ مُغَٰضِبٗا فَظَنَّ أَن لَّن نَّقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ فَنَادَىٰ فِي ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ أَن لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translation.en: And [mention] the man of the fish, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not decree [anything] upon him. And he called out within the darknesses, "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers
translation.id: Dan (ingatlah kisah) Żun Nūn (Yunus), ketika dia pergi dalam keadaan marah, lalu dia menyangka bahwa Kami tidak akan menyulitkannya, maka dia berdoa dalam keadaan yang sangat gelap,536) "Tidak ada tuhan selain Engkau, Mahasuci Engkau. Sungguh, aku termasuk orang-orang yang zalim
